entry.def: If you spend a period of time doing something in an excessive way, you can say that you are going on a particular kind of spree .

example.ex: Some Americans went on a spending spree in December to beat the new tax.
example.tran: 一些美国人在 12 月疯狂花钱，以避开新税。

means.word_mean: 1. a brief indulgence of your impulses
1. engage withour restraint in an activity and indulge, as when shopping
